**Job Description**
**In This Role, Your Responsibilities Will Be:**
 Project Engineering:
   

  

* Execute Hardware \\& Software Controls engineering.
* Technical evaluation of bid for specifications.
* Develop/review Bill of materials, network architecture, GA drawings
* Technically support vendor selection.
* Implement the Ovation control logic and graphics for the Gas Turbine control system.

* Leading the site team for Analog and Binary Device testing and fault finding
* Engaging with customer and vendors on technical aspects of site commissioning and report the progress and flags the roadblocks and challenges to site manager or project manager.
